00001 /**
00002  * @file manager.c
00003  *
00004  * @date   2009-04-17
00005  * @author Jean-Lou Dupont
00006  *
00007  *
00008  * \section Theory_Operation Theory of Operation
00009  *
00010  *                      - A Phidget Manager instance is created with the onAttach/onDetach events registered)
00011  *                              - For each device attach event, the corresponding device is _opened_ and the event handlers registered
00012  *
00013  *                      - Phidget devices status is published on a regular basis
00014  *                      - One _litm_ message bus connection is created and shared for all devices
00015  *
00016  * \section Device_Supported Device Supported
00017  *
00018  *                      For this release, only the *InterfaceKit* device family is supported.
00019  *
00020  */
00021

00059 
00060 void manager_init(void) {
00061 
00062         pthread_create(&manager_thread, NULL, &__manager_thread_function, (void *) NULL);
00063 
00064 }//
00065 
00066 void *__manager_thread_function(void *params) {
00067 
00068         litm_connection *conn;
00069         litm_code code;
00070         CPhidgetManagerHandle phidm;
00071 
00072         doLog(LOG_DEBUG, "manager: BEGIN thread, pid[%u]", getpid() );
00073 
00074         code = litm_connect_ex_wait(&conn, LITM_ID_MANAGER, 0);
00075         if (LITM_CODE_OK!=code) {
00076                 doLog(LOG_ERR, "manager: cannot connect to LITM");
00077                 return NULL;
00078         }
00079 
00080         code = litm_subscribe( conn, LITM_BUS_SYSTEM );
00081         if (LITM_CODE_OK!=code) {
00082                 doLog(LOG_ERR, "manager: cannot subscribe to LITM");
00083                 return NULL;
00084         }
00085 
00086 
00087 
00088         // open up the Phidget Manager
00089         CPhidgetManager_create(&phidm);
00090         CPhidgetManager_set_OnAttach_Handler(phidm, manager_gotAttach, (void *)conn);
00091         CPhidgetManager_set_OnDetach_Handler(phidm, manager_gotDetach, (void *)conn);
00092 
00093         CPhidgetManager_open(phidm);
00094 
00095         litm_envelope *e;
00096         bus_message   *msg;
00097         bus_message_type type;
00098         int __exit = 0;
00099 
00100         while(!__exit) {
00101 
00102                 code = litm_receive_nb( conn, &e );
00103                 if (LITM_CODE_OK==code) {
00104                         msg  = litm_get_message( e );
00105                         type = msg->type;
00106 
00107                         if (MESSAGE_SHUTDOWN==type) {
00108                                 __exit = 1;
00109                         }
00110 
00111                         if (MESSAGE_TIMER==type) {
00112                                 __manager_handle_timer(conn, phidm);
00113                         }
00114 
00115                         litm_release( conn, e);
00116                 }
00117 
00118         }//while
00119 
00120 
00121         doLog(LOG_DEBUG,"manager: END thread");
00122 }//thread
00123

00127 /**
00128  * Attach Event handler
00129  */
00130 int manager_gotAttach(CPhidgetHandle phid, void *conn) {
00131 
00132         doLog(LOG_DEBUG, "manager: device attached [%x]", phid);
00133 
00134         __manager_send_message( conn, phid, PHIDGET_DEVICE_STATUS_ACTIVE );
00135 
00136         return 0;
00137 }//[/manager_gotAttach]
00138 
00139 /**
00140  * Detach Event Handler
00141  */
00142 int manager_gotDetach(CPhidgetHandle phid, void *conn) {
00143 
00144         doLog(LOG_INFO, "manager: device detached [%x]", phid);
00145 
00146         __manager_send_message( conn, phid, PHIDGET_DEVICE_STATUS_INACTIVE );
00147 
00148         return 0;
00149 }//[/manager_gotDetach]

00155 
00156 void __manager_send_message(litm_connection *conn, CPhidgetHandle phid,  phidget_device_state state ) {
00157 
00158         litm_code   code;
00159         bus_message *msg;
00160         PhidgetDevice *pd;
00161 
00162         pd = manager_create_device_info(phid);
00163 
00164         msg = __manager_create_message_phidget_device( pd, state );
00165 
00166 
00167         code = litm_send( conn, LITM_BUS_MESSAGES, msg, __manager_clean_message_phidget_device );
00168         if (LITM_CODE_OK!=code)
00169                 doLog(LOG_ERR, "manager: error sending message through LITM");
00170 }//
00171

00173 
00174 /**
00175  * Creates from scratch a 'message_phidget_device' message
00176  */
00177 bus_message *__manager_create_message_phidget_device(PhidgetDevice *pd, phidget_device_state state) {
00178 
00179         bus_message *msg = malloc( sizeof(bus_message) );
00180         if (NULL==msg)
00181                 return NULL;
00182 
00183         pd->state = state;
00184         msg->type = MESSAGE_PHIDGET_DEVICE;
00185         msg->message_body.mpd.count = 1;
00186         msg->message_body.mpd.devices[0] = pd;
00187 
00188         return msg;
00189 }
00190 
00191 
00192 void __manager_clean_message_phidget_device(void *msg) {
00193 
00194         if (NULL==msg) {
00195                 doLog(LOG_ERR, "manager: clean_message_phidget_device: NULL pointer");
00196                 return;
00197         }
00198 
00199         bus_message *m = (bus_message *)msg;
00200 
00201         int i,count;
00202 
00203         count = m->message_body.mpd.count;
00204 
00205         for (i=0;i<count;i++)
00206                 manager_destroy_device(m->message_body.mpd.devices[i]);
00207 
00208         free( m );
00209 
00210 }//
00211 
00212 /**
00213  * Creates a device description object
00214  */
00215 PhidgetDevice* manager_create_device_info(CPhidgetHandle phid) {
00216 
00217         PhidgetDevice *pd;
00218         const char *type, *name, *label;
00219 
00220         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "manager: creating device");
00221 
00222         // if malloc fails, we have a much bigger problem
00223         pd = malloc(sizeof(PhidgetDevice));
00224 
00225         CPhidget_getSerialNumber(phid, &pd->serial);
00226         CPhidget_getDeviceVersion(phid, &pd->version);
00227         CPhidget_getDeviceType(phid, (const char **) &type);
00228         CPhidget_getDeviceName(phid, (const char **) &name);
00229         CPhidget_getDeviceLabel(phid, (const char **)&label);
00230 
00231         //perform copies
00232         size_t sz_char = sizeof(char);
00233 
00234         size_t sz_type  = strlen( type )  + sz_char;
00235         size_t sz_name  = strlen( name )  + sz_char;
00236         size_t sz_label = strlen( label ) + sz_char;
00237 
00238         pd->type  = malloc( sz_type  * sizeof(char) );
00239         pd->name  = malloc( sz_name  * sizeof(char) );
00240         pd->label = malloc( sz_label * sizeof(char) );
00241 
00242         strncpy( pd->type,  type,  sz_type  );
00243         strncpy( pd->name,  name,  sz_name  );
00244         strncpy( pd->label, label, sz_label );
00245 
00246         DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "manager: created device, type[%s]", pd->type);
00247 
00248         return pd;
00249 }//[/manager_create_device]
00250 
00251 
00252 /**
00253  * Destroys a ``PhidgetDevice`` structure
00254  */
00255 void manager_destroy_device(PhidgetDevice *pd) {
00256 
00257         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "manager: destroying device");
00258 
00259         free( pd->type );
00260         free( pd->name );
00261         free( pd->label );
00262         free( pd );
00263 
00264         //DEBUG_LOG(LOG_DEBUG, "manager: finished destroying device");
00265 
00266 }//[/manager_destroy_device]
00267 
00268 
00269 void __manager_handle_timer(litm_connection *conn, CPhidgetManagerHandle phim) {
00270 
00271         int count, result;
00272         CPhidgetHandle (*devices[MESSAGE_MAX_DEVICES]);
00273 
00274         result = CPhidgetManager_getAttachedDevices(phim, devices, &count);
00275         if (EPHIDGET_OK!=result) {
00276                 doLog(LOG_ERR, "manager: error getting attached devices" );
00277                 return;
00278         }
00279 
00280         bus_message *msg = malloc( sizeof(bus_message) );
00281         if (NULL==msg) {
00282                 CPhidgetManager_freeAttachedDevicesArray( *devices );
00283                 return;
00284         }
00285 
00286         msg->type = MESSAGE_PHIDGET_DEVICE;
00287 
00288 
00289         int i, done = 0;
00290         PhidgetDevice *device;
00291         CPhidgetHandle hdevice;
00292 
00293         for (i=0; (i<count) && (i<MESSAGE_MAX_DEVICES) ; i++ ) {
00294                 hdevice = *devices[i];
00295                 device = manager_create_device_info( hdevice );
00296                 msg->message_body.mpd.devices[i] = device;
00297                 done++;
00298         }
00299 
00300         msg->message_body.mpd.count = done;
00301 
00302         litm_code code;
00303         code = litm_send( conn, LITM_BUS_MESSAGES, msg, __manager_clean_message_phidget_device );
00304         if (LITM_CODE_OK!=code)
00305                 doLog(LOG_ERR, "manager: error sending message through LITM");
00306 
00307         CPhidgetManager_freeAttachedDevicesArray( *devices );
00308 }//
